reviewText: I saw this anime few time already. I alway enjoyed it. It story about a boy with Magic powers (Like Harry Potter story). The story and art work is good. I had to go some where else to get this dvd.

Another over the top anime about kids in a magic academy high school with cute girl weird happenings teachers that are as bad as the students and a magically created girl with enough power to destroy the world. Lots of laughs.
